department.ch: 人力資源管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch: This doctoral seminar provides foundation knowledge and emerging issues in the field of organizational behavior (OB). The three main purposes of this seminar are to introduce students to OB research literature, to critically assess both the theoretical and the methodological aspects of OB research, and to develop research skills necessary to conduct own program of research.
goal.en: This doctoral seminar provides foundation knowledge and emerging issues in the field of organizational behavior (OB). The three main purposes of this seminar are to introduce students to OB research literature, to critically assess both the theoretical and the methodological aspects of OB research, and to develop research skills necessary to conduct own program of research.

outline.ch: In this course, students will be required a great deal of reading and thinking of the assigned readings before class. The seminar format will also allow students to advance their own understanding of OB research by sharing arguments and ideas among others, listening to others, or even challenging others’ standpoints.
